extensionDescription.message: A simple webextension to extract citations from UpToDate.

hoverDescription.description: Message shown, when user hovers over the addon's icon.

loadingMessage.description: A placeholder message shown before getting any response from content-scipt

copySuccess.message: CSL Bibliography has been successfully copied to clipboard!
copySuccess.description: Message shown, when both extraction and copying to clipboard succeed.

copyError.message: Bibliography could not be copied to clipboard!
copyError.description: Message shown, when error occurs during copying to clipboard.
